한국어: Adds custom radio stations the game
이 메시지는 모드가 업데이트 되었음을 알려드리기 위한 것입니다.
자세한 변경 사항은 Steam 워크샵이나 GitHub를 참조하세요.

If you have performance problems, you can try to disable features
marked with an asterisk (*).

You can add your own channels or music by installing music packs,
putting station configurations or music files into the "CSLMusicMod_Music" folder
or into the folder containing vanilla radio content.

You can find information in the CSL Music Mod Wiki and the Steam Workshop entry.
Don't forget to enable "Enable detailed debugging logging" if you want to provide a log.
Create channels from unused music files
Extend vanilla stations with custom content (Needs reload)
Open folder containing the radio station.

This channel is not a radio-channel. Your custom music
can be found in "User Defined", "CSLMusic Mix" and
channels created by music packs.
